channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: See image, 9th February
item.description:
Mould and other things growing on the signage - would be very grateful if these signs could be cleaned

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mapesbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Top missing to bin, 9th February
item.description:
Hi this bin top has been missing for months. The rubbish flies everywhere and the foxes constantly getting into it (a lot live in the property just by the bins location) It would be good to either remove the bin or put a new top on it. THANK YOU!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Greenwich South Street, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extremely deep pothole on narrow road, no way to avoid it., 9th February
item.description:
This pothole as been there for weeks and is extremely deep. Given that there is no way around it as the road is extremely narrow, vehicles are forced to drive over it and potentially be damaged.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Windmill Walk, Waterloo, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish all over alley way and behind shops, bin spilling out rubbish, 9th February
item.description:
I have complained before, but things are getting worse, as can be seen from pictures. A fence would be beneficial at bottom of alley as you walk in from pavement and co-op car park. Iâ€™m already picking up rubbish in Orchard Way, close to where I live. Considering amount we pay in council tax each month, I would expect better attention to public walk ways.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ernest Grove, Upper Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Medical gas canisters dumped by our front doo, 9th February
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Upper Clapton Road, London
